statements: SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT event_description, impact_intensity FROM geopolitical_events WHERE supply_chain_route = 'Route A';
SELECT event_id, event_date FROM geopolitical_events WHERE impact_intensity > 5 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_description, supply_chain_route FROM geopolitical_events WHERE impact_intensity < 3 ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM geopolitical_events WHERE impact_intensity > 5 ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events WHERE supply_chain_route LIKE '%Europe%' OR supply_chain_route LIKE '%Asia%' ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT event_description, impact_intensity FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY impact_intensity DESC
SELECT event_id, event_description, impact_intensity FROM geopolitical_events WHERE impact_intensity > 2 AND supply_chain_route IS NULL ORDER BY event_id ASC
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events WHERE impact_intensity < 4 OR supply_chain_route IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events;
SELECT event_id, event_date, impact_level FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_type = 'Natural Disaster';
SELECT event_date, location FROM geopolitical_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events WHERE impact_level > 3;
SELECT event_type, location, impact_level FROM geopolitical_events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_type = 'natural disaster' AND impact_level > 5 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_type, location, impact_level FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_type, location, impact_level FROM geopolitical_events WHERE location LIKE '%America%' ORDER BY event_date ASC, impact_level DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, transportation_mode FROM supply_chain_routes WHERE transportation_mode = 'air';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, transportation_mode FROM supply_chain_routes WHERE start_location = 'Port of Los Angeles' OR end_location = 'Port of Long Beach';
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_location = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT route_name, origin_location, destination_location FROM supply_chain_routes WHERE distance_km < 1000;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM risk_mitigation_strategies WHERE implementation_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_location = 'United States' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01' AND event_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM supply_chain_routes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_mitigation_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%Cyber%' AND implementation_status = TRUE;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_location <> 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_description FROM geopolitical_events;
SELECT route_id, route_name, source_country_id, destination_country_id FROM supply_chain_routes;
SELECT * FROM countries WHERE country_name = 'USA';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_description FROM risk_mitigation_strategies WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, source_country_id, destination_country_id FROM supply_chain_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT country_name FROM countries WHERE country_name LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY country_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_description FROM risk_mitigation_strategies WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_type = 'Natural Disaster';
SELECT location_id, location_name, country, region FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT route_name, distance_km, transportation_mode FROM supply_chain_routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT event_id, route_id, impact_score FROM event_impact WHERE analysis_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM geopolitical_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_type, location_id, impact_description FROM geopolitical_events WHERE event_type='Natural Disaster';

SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_type, location_id, impact_description FROM geopolitical_events WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE country='USA' AND region='North America');
SELECT event_name, event_type, location_id, impact_description FROM geopolitical_events JOIN event_impact ON geopolitical_events.event_id = event_impact.event_id WHERE impact_score > 80;
SELECT route_id, route_name, origin_location_id, destination_location_id, distance_km FROM supply_chain_routes WHERE transportation_mode='Ship' ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
